item.title: Adversarial Generation of Continuous Implicit Shape Representations
item.description: This article provides an overview of the paper “Adversarial Generation of Continuous Implicit Shape Representations”, which I co-authored with Matthias Fey. While the paper focuses on the theoretical aspects, I’ll provide a higher level explanation and and some visualizations here on the blog.
